<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Greater Shadow](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3187)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Shadows that spend long amounts of time on [the Netherworld](/Planes.aspx?ID=36) and absorb its magic become greater shadows.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=46)): DC 23

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 7">[Greater Shadow](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3187)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Incorporeal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=632" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=722" />
<trait label="Unholy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=521" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 306 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +14; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59)

**Languages**
[Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +16, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +20

<row gap="medium">
**Str** -5

**Dex** +5

**Con** +0

**Int** +0

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +4
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 24 

**Fort** +11 

**Ref** +18 

**Will** +15 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 75
([void healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=83))

</row>

**Immunities**
bleed, [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=571) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=578), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=85), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=669), precision, [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=95)

**Resistances**
all 10 (except [force](/Traits.aspx?ID=610), [_ghost touch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2840), [spirit](/Traits.aspx?ID=737), or [vitality](/Traits.aspx?ID=509); double resistance vs. non-[magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103))

**Weaknesses**
light vulnerability

**Light Vulnerability** Attacks against the shadow are treated as [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=644) if made by a creature who is in magical light or with an object that is in magical light (such as from the [_light_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1585) spell).

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** fly 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
shadow hand +18 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 2d10+6 void

**Divine Innate Spells** DC 25
- **2nd**
[Darkness](/Spells.aspx?ID=59) (at will)

**Shadow Spawn**   When a creature's shadow is pulled free by Steal Shadow, it becomes a shadow spawn under the command of the shadow that created it. This shadow spawn doesn't have Steal Shadow. If the creature the shadow spawn was pulled from dies, the shadow spawn becomes a full-fledged, autonomous shadow. If the creature recovers from its enfeeblement, its shadow returns to it and the shadow spawn is extinguished.

**Slink in Shadows**   The shadow can [Hide](/Actions.aspx?ID=2404) or end its [Sneak](/Actions.aspx?ID=2405) in a creature's or object's shadow.

**Steal Shadow** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48)) **Requirements** The shadow hit a living creature with a shadow hand Strike on its previous action; **Effect** The shadow pulls at the target's shadow, making the creature [enfeebled 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=71) (or enfeebled 3 on a critical hit). This is cumulative with other enfeebled conditions from shadows, to a maximum of enfeebled 4. If this increases a creature's enfeebled value to 3 or more, the target's shadow is separated from its body (see shadow spawn). The enfeebled value from Steal Shadow decreases by 1 every hour.

</column>
